title: marley2010
author: marley2010
content: Hi Guys,I just started with mining.As minin app i use verus Miner9000.I paste my bitcoin (recive) wallet and select for example Luckpool (AP).As Worker i put "test"I start te mining app and I ann see the app is mining.Then I go to Luckpool.net and paste my wallet adres, i do not see any workers. This part is empty. I shoud see as worker "test".What am i doing wrong?

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: First thing you're doing wrong is trying to mine with a mobile device. Most mobile "Apps" for mining are scams and those that aren'twill overheat your device and risk a battery fire. Real mining is power intensive and produces a lot of heat, anything that claims otherwise is a scam.Dig up an old desktop and put a GPU in it if you want to give mining a try.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: JayDDee on May 19, 2023, 06:03:07 PMFirst thing you're doing wrong is trying to mine with a mobile device. Most mobile "Apps" for mining are scams and those that aren'twill overheat your device and risk a battery fire. Real mining is power intensive and produces a lot of heat, anything that claims otherwise is a scam.Dig up an old desktop and put a GPU in it if you want to give mining a try.App in mobile phone are scamÂ   I never find that are not scam maybe staking app that availabe on mobile phone but rest of it either scam app or just game that pretend you have dozen of miner like other tycoon game it fun to play tho
